metadata.title: CVE-2024-40997 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cpufreq: amd-pstate: fix memory leak on CPU EPP exitThe cpudata memory from kzalloc() in amd_pstate_epp_cpu_init() isnot freed in the analogous exit function, so fix that.[ rjw: Subject and changelog edits ]
